_header: Alas dear heart what aileth thee
_description: A lover protests his devotion — four quatrains, each including refrain: ‘Yt were my death to se you dye’

BodLauMis735.First Lines: Alas dere hart what ayleth the…
BodLauMis735.Note:
Incorrectly listed as Laud misc. 595 (SC 1502) in Robbins  and  Cutler (1965)
